options.command: concurrently --kill-others --names "angular,react,vue,qwik,solid,svelte" --prefix-colors "red,blue,green,magenta,white,yellow" "npx nx serve angular-project" "npx nx serve react-project" "npx nx serve vue-project" "npx nx serve qwik-project" "npx nx serve solid-project" "npx nx serve svelte-project"
